Comments_List: This taught me a lot of the same AF principles that Ive been learning since freshman year but added more with the context of us now being POC.
I liked the video scenarios that used up-to-date situations that we could very well encounter ourselves, such as associating with civilians who smoke marijuana in a state where its legal.

The course was very relaxed but was engaging. I think that the workshops we did were especially useful, and while TED talks were interesting, we spend a good portion of our class listening to them rather than discussing them.
Taught very well. Engaging lectures and assignments.
N/A - take if youre in ROTC
